New Records: Gous and Harmeet put on the second highest partnership for the sixth-wicket in all T20Is.
Key Match Events: Keshav Maharaj bowled with figures of 1 for 24.
Tabraiz Shamsi took a wicket with his first ball.
Kagiso Rabada was pacy and accurate.
Corey Anderson took a skier to dismiss Reeza Hendricks.
Netravalkar bowled a spell of 2 for 21 in four overs.
USA bowlers conceded 148 runs in 12 overs.
South Africa posted the highest score in Antigua - 194.
USA finished on 176 for 6, 18 runs short.
Pre-Game Insights: USA captain Monank Patel did not recover from his shoulder injury, so Aaron Jones stood in for him.
South Africa went in with two spinners, leaving out Ottneil Baartman.
Post-Match Reflections: USA showed they have what it takes to play at this level despite the loss.
South Africa remained unbeaten in the Super Eights.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's women's team lost to India by 4 runs in a high-scoring ODI.
USA automatically qualified for the 2026 tournament.
